thread.title: ESD Suppression Components: World Markets, Technologies & Opportunities: 2015-2020
thread.title_full: ESD Suppression Components: World Markets, Technologies & Opportunities: 2015-2020

author: admin
title: ESD Suppression Components: World Markets, Technologies & Opportunities: 2015-2020
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/1/2015 @ 3:25 PM   ReportLinker 
NEW YORK, Oct. 1, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Quick Overview This new report from Paumanok Publications, Inc. takes a detailed look at the global market for the electronic components used to protect sensitive circuitry against damaging electro-static discharge, including TVS diodes and arrays, multilayered chip varistors and arrays, and polymeric ESD suppressors. The 350 report, released February 16, 2015, is the first detailed analysis of the global high volume industry for port and interface protection against transients caused by triboelectricity and related overvoltage events that are addressed in IEC 61000 specifications. The study begins by addressing the component technologies employed as ESD suppression devices; a look at the regulations that outline the performance requirements (rise times and clamping voltages) of ESD suppression components; the key market drivers behind demand, the value and volume of global consumption for ESD suppression components by type; the price comparison between components by type, the end-use markets into which they are sold; the critical ports and interfaces requiring ESD suppression by key product market; demand by world region; variations in component packaging; technology roadmap; competitive environment; vendor sales and market shares by component type; detailed forecasts by component type, end-use market segment and world region; and emerging market opportunities for ESD suppression components. 
ESD Suppression Components: World Markets, Technologies & Opportunities: 2015-2020
